languages.text: "Монахи Электродинамической Обители проявили небывалое мужество перед лицом ереси. Достойные сыны Омниссии!"
"The Electro-Priests of the Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"
languages.original_text: "Монахи Электродинамической Обители проявили небывалое мужество перед лицом ереси. Достойные сыны Омниссии!"

traits.locale_text: "The monks of the Electrodynamic Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"
"The monks of the Electrodynamic Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"
"The monks of the Electrodynamic Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"
"The monks of the Electrodynamic Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"

languages.text: “神圣电驱修会的电僧在面对异端时，展现出了前所未有的勇气。欧姆尼塞亚的这些子嗣值得尊敬！”
languages.original_text: "The Electro-Priests of the Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: “神圣电驱力修会的僧侣在面对异端时，展现出了前所未有的勇气。欧姆尼塞亚的这些子嗣值得尊敬！”

languages.text: « Les électro-prêtres du Cénobium ont fait preuve d'un courage exemplaire face à l'hérésie. Ce sont de dignes enfants de l'Omnimessie ! »
languages.original_text: "The Electro-Priests of the Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: « Les moines du Cénobium électrodynamique ont fait preuve d'un courage exemplaire face à l'hérésie. Ce sont de dignes enfants de l'Omnimessie ! »

languages.text: "Elektropriester des Cenobiums haben im Angesicht der Ketzerei einzigartigen Mut bewiesen. Würdige Kinder des Omnissiah!"
languages.original_text: "The Electro-Priests of the Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Mönche des Elektrodynamischen Cenobiums haben im Angesicht der Ketzerei einzigartigen Mut bewiesen. Würdige Kinder des Omnissiah!"

languages.text: 「電力連生体のエレクトロ・プリーストたちは、異端を前にしてかつてない勇気を示しました。万機神の子供にふさわしい姿です！」
languages.original_text: "The Electro-Priests of the Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: 「電力連生体の修道士たちは、異端を前にしてかつてない勇気を示しました。万機神の子供にふさわしい姿です！」

languages.text: «Los electrosacerdotes del Cenobio han demostrado un valor sin precedentes ante la herejía. ¡Dignos hijos del Omnissiah!».
languages.original_text: "The Electro-Priests of the Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: «Los monjes del Cenobio Electrodinámico han demostrado un valor sin precedentes ante la herejía. ¡Dignos hijos del Omnissiah!».

languages.original_text: "The Electro-Priests of the Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"

languages.text: "Senobiyum'un Elektro Rahipleri, kâfirlik karşısında olağanüstü bir cesaret sergiledi. Çok yaşasın Hermesih'in kutlu evlatları!"
languages.original_text: "The Electro-Priests of the Cenobium have shown unprecedented courage in the face of heresy. Worthy children of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: "Senobiyum'un Elektro Rahipleri, kâfirlik karşısında olağanüstü bir cesaret sergiledi. Çok yaşasın Hermesih'in kutlu evlatları!"
